scripts.dev:local: cp .env.local.backup .env.local 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backup found, using current .env.local' && next dev --turbopack
scripts.env:prod: cp .env.local .env.local.backup 2>/dev/null || true && cp .env.production .env.local && echo 'Switched to production environment'
scripts.env:dev: cp .env.local.backup .env.local 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backup found, creating development environment' && cp .env.example .env.local && echo 'Switched to development environment'
